string.text: A sort of weird command center, and what is typical, it is in the functioning condition. Apparently, Monolith - is somebody's handwork. He should find those \nhands swiftly and sever them.
Monolith is nearby, it's calling for me. It really exists. And my wishes will soon be granted.

Gunslinger, during his first raid to the center of the Zone, have found a mechanism, which was called a decoder and he thought that using this decoder he \nwill be able to open some kind of an especially secret door, either at the station, or in the sarcophagus itself.

Notwithstanding everything you made it, stalker. And you turned out to be much more powerful, than we thought in the beginning. \nRight it's time for us to talk. Follow the signal, we will be waiting for you.
